label: alz
text:
"Being married doubles joys,
halves sadness...and quadruples
living expenses."

label: ant00
text:
"Don't punch your nose to
spite your face."

label: ant02
text: "A thing of beauty is a joy forever."

label: bea01
text:
"Time spent with friends is time
well spent."

label: bea02
text: "A Bell saved is a Bell earned."

label: bea03
text:
"All good things must come to
an end."

label: bea06
text:
"Rocky road is more than just a flavor
of ice cream."

label: bea07
text:
"Even the best of friends start out
as strangers."

label: bea09
text:
"Those who live in glass houses
shouldn't throw stones."

label: bea11
text:
"The higher you climb, the smaller
things look."

label: bea15
text:
"Take a page out of someone else's
book, if it's a good book."

label: brd01
text:
"Always keep your wings manicured
so you can fly away."

label: brd02
text:
"Why do today what you can put off
until tomorrow?"

label: brd03
text:
"It's the early bird that catches
the worm!"

label: brd04
text:
"When you're a team of one, you're
always captain!"

label: brd08
text:
"When the world gets cold, just
fly south."

label: brd11
text:
"Your greatest strength can be your
greatest weakness."

label: brd15
text:
"Birds of a feather, et cetera,
et cetera..."

label: brd16
text:
"Better to have loved and squawked
than to have never loved at all."

label: brd17
text: "The best defense is a good offense."

label: brd18
text:
"The proof of the pudding is in
the eating."

label: bul03
text: "As a cow grows, so do its nostrils."

label: bul07
text:
"Fool me once, shame on you.
Fool me twice, shame on me."

label: bul08
text:
"You mess with the bull, you get
the horns."

label: cat05
text:
"When life gives you lemons,
make lemonade!"

label: cat06
text:
"There's always more fish in
the sea!"

label: cat09
text:
"If you make your opponent flinch,
you have already won."

label: cat12
text:
"You can never have too much of a
good thing!"

label: cat14
text:
"If you want something done well, do
it yourself."

label: cat15
text:
"There's no use crying over
spilled milk."

label: cbr03
text:
"There's no such thing as a
free lunch."

label: cbr17
text: "If a job is worth doing, do it right!"

label: chn01
text:
"Don't put all your eggs in
one basket."

label: chn02
text:
"You gotta break a few eggs to make
an omelet."

label: chn09
text:
"A fool and his Bells are
soon parted."

label: chn10
text: "Keep your crumbs out of the bed."

label: chn12
text:
"Don't peck the hand that
feeds you."

label: cow00
text: "A friend in need is a friend indeed!"

label: cow06
text:
"If you want what you have, then
you'll have what you want."

label: crd04
text:
"The hero is brave in deeds as well
as words."

label: crd06
text:
"Don't bite off more than you
can chew."

label: crd07
text:
"An ounce of prevention is worth a
pound of cure."

label: crd08
text:
"There is no room for two dragons in
one pond."

label: der00
text: "The first step is always the hardest."

label: der04
text:
"Legs of an antelope, heart of
an eagle."

label: der05
text:
"Always look both ways before
crossing the street."

label: der08
text: "Sometimes you have to lose to win."

label: der09
text:
"If you're afraid of wolves, don't go
to the woods."

label: dog00
text:
"A little bit of happiness is better
than a lot of anguish."

label: dog01
text:
"A house without either a cat or a
dog is a sad house indeed."

label: dog02
text: "Don't bite the hand that feeds you."

label: dog04
text:
"A snack a day keeps the
vacuum away."

label: dog06
text:
"The dog wags his tail, not for you,
but for your bread."

label: dog08
text:
"Don't lose sight of what you're
really after."

label: dog15
text:
"There's not a dog so bad that he
won't wag his tail."

label: dog16
text: "A good dog deserves a good treat."

label: dog17
text:
"One dog barks at something, the
rest bark at him."

label: dog18
text:
"Even dogs won't get in the middle of
true love."

label: duk00
text:
"Even though there's no 'I' in team,
there is a 'me'!"

label: duk01
text:
"Don't get your feathers all ruffled.
Just chill."

label: duk03
text: "A wise duck takes care of its bill."

label: duk07
text:
"Act now before you change
your mind!"

label: duk10
text:
"Some birds avoid the water, ducks
look for it."

label: duk12
text:
"If the world is flooded, it will be easy
for the duck."

label: elp00
text:
"However little you think of an
elephant, you can't say it won't fill
a pot."

label: elp02
text:
"A big nose never spoiled a
handsome face."

label: elp06
text:
"Do not compare a fly with
an elephant."

label: elp07
text:
"You need the sour to highlight
the sweet."

label: elp12
text: "Do what you want, but do it loud!"

label: flg03
text: "What you can't see can't hurt you."

label: flg11
text:
"Cold coffee makes for a
cold demeanor."

label: flg12
text:
"Catch more flies with honey
than vinegar."

label: flg13
text:
"It takes more muscles to frown
than smile."

label: flg15
text:
"A healthy mind makes for a
healthy body."

label: flg16
text:
"Look at the world through
rose-colored glasses."

label: flg18
text: "Eyes are the windows to the soul."

label: flg19
text:
"The way to a frog's heart is through
his stomach."

label: goa07
text:
"Be yourself, everyone else is
already taken."

label: goa08
text:
"Before you judge someone, walk a
mile in their hooves."

label: gor00
text:
"As soon as you can grow a
mustache, do it."

label: gor05
text:
"There's always time to take a
second look."

label: gor07
text:
"Pearls are a pink gorilla's
best friend."

label: gor08
text:
"Life is a buffet. Always go back
for seconds."

label: gor09
text: "Art feeds the soul. So does pizza."

label: ham05
text: "Life is just a bowl of cherries."

label: ham06
text:
"Squeak your mind, even if your
voice shakes."

label: ham07
text:
"Children should be seen and
not heard."

label: hip00
text:
"The only thing to fear is fear itself...
and wasps!"

label: hip02
text:
"It's best to keep your lips and
purse sealed."

label: hip03
text:
"The best part of spring is
the picnics!"

label: hip04
text:
"Eighth place is just the
seventh loser."

label: hip05
text:
"Necessity is the mother of
all invention."

label: hip08
text:
"Patience is a virtue for folks
with time."

label: hrs01
text: "Don't put the cart before the horse."

label: hrs03
text:
"The horse doesn't pull the cart, the
oats do."

label: hrs05
text:
"Smile, and the world smiles
with you."

label: hrs07
text:
"There's something lovable in all
of us."

label: hrs09
text:
"Let gossip go in one ear and out
the other."

label: hrs16
text:
"You can only be you, so be the
best you that you can be."

label: kal00
text: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder."

label: kal01
text:
"Treat others as you would like to
be treated."

label: kal02
text:
"A friend who shares is a friend
who cares."

label: kal05
text: "Half a loaf is better than none."

label: kal08
text: "It's never too late to start over."

label: kal10
text:
"Imitation is the sincerest form
of flattery."

label: kgr05
text:
"The apple doesn't fall far from
the tree."

label: kgr10
text:
"The road to a friend's house is
never long."

label: lon01
text:
"Better a live coward than a
forgotten hero."

label: lon02
text:
"Three wrongs don't make a right,
but three rights make a left."

label: lon04
text:
"The bigger the fish, the bigger
your dinner."

label: lon06
text: "The lion's share goes to the lion."

label: mnk02
text:
"Friends go together like peanut
butter and bananas."

label: mnk05
text: "Do as I say, not as I do."

label: mnk06
text:
"See no donut, hear no donut, speak
no donut."

label: mnk07
text: "A good start leads to a good end."

label: mus02
text:
"A glamour shot is worth a
thousand words."

label: mus03
text: "The gift says more about the giver."

label: mus04
text: "Squeak softly and carry a big stick."

label: mus08
text:
"The players may change, but the
music stays the same."

label: mus14
text:
"A cornered rat will summon the
courage to bite a cat."

label: mus17
text:
"One mile or a thousand makes no
difference to love."

label: mus18
text:
"Meeting is just the start of us
saying goodbye."

label: ocp01
text:
"If you can't say something nice,
don't say anything at all."

label: ost00
text:
"You never get a second chance to
make a first impression."

label: ost02
text:
"Soaring through the sky takes more
than a pair of wings."

label: ost05
text:
"Cut once, measure twice... Wait—
reverse that."

label: ost10
text: "You can't keep a good bird down."

label: pbr01
text:
"Pampering yourself is as important
as food, water, and shelter!"

label: pbr02
text:
"When someone says fly, you ask
how high!"

label: pbr06
text:
"Today is the last day of the rest of
your life."

label: pbr07
text:
"Discretion is the better part
of valor."

label: pbr08
text:
"Even in a room full of fools, someone
is the smartest."

label: pgn01
text:
"You must learn to waddle before
you can swim."

label: pgn04
text:
"You can't learn a life lesson from a
fortune cookie."

label: pgn05
text:
"Mind your manners, or someone
else will."

label: pgn06
text:
"A bad attitude will land you in the
penalty box."

label: pgn09
text:
"Which came first, the seeds or
the sunflower?"

label: pgn11
text: "Six of one, half dozen of the other."

label: pgn14
text:
"Frosting is just the icing on
the cake."

label: pig01
text: "The best things in life are free."

label: pig02
text: "Don't judge a book by its cover."

label: pig05
text: "It's never too late for a snack."

label: pig10
text:
"All a plant needs is love...and sun
and water and soil."

label: pig14
text:
"You can't have your cake and eat
it too."

label: rbt02
text:
"Don't put off till tomorrow what
you can do today."

label: rbt03
text:
"A good ninja is neither seen
nor heard."

label: rbt04
text:
"An ear for an ear makes it hard
to hear."

label: rbt08
text: "Fall down seven times, get up eight."

label: rbt11
text: "Don't judge a rabbit by its ears."

label: rbt12
text:
"You can't have wise folks if you
don't have fools too."

label: rbt13
text:
"A fool and their Bells are
soon parted."

label: rbt14
text:
"A wise mammal gives danger a
wide berth."

label: rhn00
text:
"Remember to keep your core
muscles engaged!"

label: rhn01
text:
"Don't look down your nose
at people!"

label: rhn04
text:
"You can't hit a mosquito with
a horseshoe."

label: shp02
text: "There is a point to every encounter."

label: shp08
text:
"If you want to know yourself better,
ask your neighbors."

label: shp12
text:
"There's a black sheep in
every family."

label: shp15
text: "Be true to your most shiny self."

label: squ00
text:
"Never take a nibble when you can
take a bite."

label: squ03
text:
"Promises are like pie crusts—
they're made to be broken."

label: squ05
text:
"You gotta put the pedal to
the metal!"

label: squ07
text:
"Even the smallest acorn may grow
into the tallest tree."

label: squ10
text:
"You gotta break a few shells to get
to the nut."

label: squ13
text:
"There's no such thing as a
safe secret."

label: squ14
text:
"Remember to see the forest
between the trees."

label: squ16
text:
"Winners don't quit, and quitters
never win."

label: tig04
text:
"That's the way the energy
bar crumbles."

label: tig06
text:
"There is such a thing as love at
first sight."

label: wol00
text:
"Don't wish it were easier; wish you
were better."

label: wol01
text: "If it's not one thing, it's another."

label: wol02
text: "Don't be afraid to show your fangs."

label: wol03
text: "Don't cry wolf unless you mean it."

label: wol05
text: "Don't stray too far from the pack."

label: wol06
text:
"You mess with the wolf, you get
the fangs."

label: wol10
text:
"Never trust a sheep in
wolf's clothing."

label: wol12
text:
"Be the kind of person your future
self won't regret having been."
